summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 6 December to end of Monday 6 December GMT
description: Monday will be overcast with temperatures around 7 degrees and rain forecast in the afternoon.<br/><br/>A northerly breeze will ensure pollution remains 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
